summary: REQ-20 and REQ-21 appear implemented: hero branding is logo-only, footer copyright no longer contains “Smart Janghai”, and BrandLogo now uses a non-text placeholder on image load failure. However, the diff also introduces additional footer user-facing content (Support section and caffeine.ai attribution) that was not requested and may violate the “do not rewrite beyond removing brand-name text” non-goal.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded footer content beyond removing the brand name (e.g., “Your trusted information hub”, “Support” section with email, and “Built with … caffeine.ai” attribution link with UTM parameters).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to remove visible “Smart Janghai” branding text and adjust logo fallback behavior; it explicitly states not to redesign the homepage layout or rewrite non-branding informational copy beyond removing brand-name text.
